1.title: Big Egos
1.plot: The House of Glam styles a music video for The Dream and a photo shoot for a new music artist. Meanwhile, agency owner, Brandi, interviews for a new hairstylist/makeup artist to add to the agency, who isn't met kindly by Crystal.

2.title: In Over Their Heads
2.plot: Crystal's creative risks on a test shoot push Brandi and Amoy to the breaking point.

3.title: Outsized
3.plot: Crystal outfits Jermaine Dupri and Nelly for a costume party. Amoy juggles celebrity clients while construction is underway in her salon.

4.title: LA LA Land
4.plot: Crystal and Atiba head to Los Angeles for big jobs with Mario for The Grammys and Jo Jo for a performance.

5.title: Atiba's Dilemma
5.plot: Crystal puts her new assistant Shaun to the test styling for a charity event while Atiba lets off steam at Mercedes Benz Fashion Week.

6.title: Celebrity Sample Sale
6.plot: Crystal raises money for her jewelry line by selling off the exclusive contents of her stylist closet while Amoy struggles to bring her new salon staff up to par.

7.title: First Time for Everything
7.plot: Michiko stretches herself thin as a hair and make up combo for a Maxim shoot while Mike B. styles a woman for the first time at a Source Magazine shoot.

8.title: Battle Royale
8.plot: Crystal and Amoy clash over how to style a wig at Crystal's new jewelry line photo shoot and Michiko steps into the fray.

imdb.plot outline: B Lynn Group is one of the hottest image agencies in the entertainment business: agents to the top fashion stylists, makeup artists and hairstylists around--with Brandi Simpkins at the helm. The House of Glam docu-series features her and her team. These fashion stylists, makeup artists and hairstylists to the stars specialize in cooking up original and unforgettable looks for some of the biggest names in music an fashion--so they stand out in Hollywood and beyond. And this show takes you through the chaotic days of trying to please demanding clients, taking you behind the scenes of their magazine-glossy world. But don't forget the drama! After all, this show is about more than what to wear: The cast is not only comprised of colleagues, but also best friends and fierce rivals.
